name: PirateScape
description:
Hey there ^^

The game is still in devellopment but we have something !

The game is made by me Nimerya and my teamMate Daized.

The controls for the game are :

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Right click to place a tower ( Cost 2 woods and 1 rock )

On a tower :

  • Left Click to upgrade range ( Cost 1 rock )
  • Right Click to upgrade damage ( Cost 1 wood )

The game will be updated in a week, 

Sorry for the lack of content and the bugs.

Have fun !
